TEXT_DICT.This: Contains pairs of Strings, used to get values based on keys.

TEXT: Please make your choice. Note that it will be reset when you exit the game.
Memoria of the Far Side of the Moon
1) Whenever you play a non-Noble Phantasm cards, For each point of energy spent on it, you gain #b%d%% #yNoble Phantasm Gauge. NL 2) Whenever you are attacked, gain NP equal to half damaged.
Choose a Noble Phantasm into your hand.
Unlimited Blade Works: at the start of each turn, choose a copy of Attack from your deck into your hand.
put on top of your draw pile.
Choose obtain a Noble Phantasm card, Upgrade a random card.
Choose obtain a Noble Phantasm card, Upgrade a random card.
These cards will be retained and removed from the current battle after they are played.

Characters have #yNoble Phantasm Gauge! NL #yNoble Phantasm Gauge can be gained by taking damage (including blocked damage), or by consuming energy. For each point of energy spent on non-Noble Phantasm cards, you gain #b%d%% #yNoble Phantasm Gauge.

When the Noble Phantasm Gauge reaches #b100, click the button to use the Noble Phantasm, and the gauge will be emptied. NL When the gauge reaches #b200 or #b300, or when you play a #yNoble Phantasm card, you gain #yNoble #yPhantasm #yCharge #yUp, up to a maximum of #b4 stacks. The Noble Phantasm will be enhanced based on the number of stacks.
When you deal damage, you gain #yCritical Stars. After reaching #b10 stars, playing an attack card will consume #b10 stars to double the damage.

If you're in trouble during battle, you can click to use #yCommand Spells to help. #yCommand Spells can only be used #b3 times. If you die without using all #b3, you will consume all 3 Command Spells to revive and gain #b300% #yNoble Phantasm Gauge.
